text: Kaadu nabiyow ama koros girál xayyowsiman waqdi, mangacannah (rammit kinnuk) meesitak boola-le wagittoh girâ fanah wagitah ken table conxok gexxaamah, kaadu yeemene mari jannatti addal anuk korosut finqak takkem yablen waqdi, diggah fingittem qhiyaamâ saaku sinni nafsii kee sinni buxah mara girâ culimil finqise mara iyyan, oobbiya diggaluk koros qhiyaamah ayró aggiriqqe sinni digaaláy amok keenik kate waytah addat yanin
